T02TD1303E:209a-0: @209a `/ sbyin sreg gi las kyi rim pa bzhugs so//
T02TD1303E:209a-2: * // bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1303E:209a-3: sbyin sreg gi las kyi rim pa la /
T02TD1303E:209a-4: dbang bskur ba'i sngon rol du rgyas pa'i las byas te /
T02TD1303E:209a-5: dpangs khru gang la khru phyed thur du brko'o //
T02TD1303E:209a-8: zheng dang dpangs sor bzhi bya /
T02TD1303E:209a-9: de'i phyi rol gyi sor bzhi por la /
T02TD1303E:209a-11: dbus kyi kha khyer la rdo rje ra ba gtang /
T02TD1303E:209a-12: spyir gru bzhi la zheng phyi rol gyi rgya khru gsum gtang /
T02TD1303E:209a-13: thab khung nang du gtso bo'i phyag mtshan gzhag pa ni 'jim pa la sogs pa la zheng sor brgyad dpangs sor gcig gtang /
T02TD1303E:209a-19: kha dog ser por byug go //
T02TD1303E:209a-20: rgyas pa'i las la kha shar du blta'o //
T02TD1303E:209a-21: zhi pa'i thab khung zlum po khru gang du byas /
T02TD1303E:209a-23: kha khyer rgyas pa la sogs pa dang mthun par bya'o //
T02TD1303E:209a-24: dbus kyi kha khyer la rdo rje phreng ba gtang /
T02TD1303E:209a-25: de'i phyi rol tu padma gtang /
T02TD1303E:209a-26: thab khung du gtso bo'i phyag mtshan gzhag pa ni dbus su rdo rje /
T02TD1303E:209a-32: kha dog dkar por byug / bla ma kha byang du blta /
T02TD1303E:209a-33: dbang gi las la thab khung zla gam ste /
T02TD1303E:209a-34: zla gam bshul la bzhi bcu btang /
T02TD1303E:209a-35: kha khyer la sor bzhi bcu tham pa /
T02TD1303E:209a-36: zabs su sor bcu brko bar bya /
T02TD1303E:209a-38: kha khyer rdo rje'i ra ba gtang /
T02TD1303E:209a-39: phyi rim du me ri gtang /
T02TD1303E:209a-40: kha dog dmar por byug / tsandan smug pos byug / dbus su gtso bo'i phyag mtshan btang ba /
T02TD1303E:209a-42: dbang dang bskrad pa la kha nub tu blta /
T02TD1303E:209a-43: drag po'i las kyi rim pa la /
T02TD1303E:209b-0: @209b sor nyi shu nyi shu bya'o //
T02TD1303E:209b-1: kha khyer sor gsum phyir dgyed /
T02TD1303E:209b-4: de'i phyi rol du sor gsum gtang /
T02TD1303E:209b-5: kha khyer la rdo rje rtse gsum pa gtang /
T02TD1303E:209b-6: de'i phyi rim du thod pa dang /
T02TD1303E:209b-8: mdud rtse gsum pa la sogs pa drag po'i phyag mtshan gtang /
T02TD1303E:209b-9: gtso bo'i phyag mtshan dbus su ral gri /
T02TD1303E:209b-10: phyi ma las kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02TD1303E:209b-11: bla ma'i kha las shes par bya'o //
T02TD1303E:209b-12: kha dog nag pos byug / kha lhor blta'o //
T02TD1303E:209b-14: zhi ba nyi ma phyed na bya'o //
T02TD1303E:209b-15: dbang nyi ma nub na bya'o //
T02TD1303E:209b-16: drag po nam phyed na bya'o //
T02TD1303E:209b-18: mchod rdzas dang sreg rdzas kyi rim pa la /
T02TD1303E:209b-19: sngags mkhan gyi g-yon du dri dang me tog gis bkang ba'i dung phor gzhag / yon chab kyi snod gser la sogs pa las kyi bye brag dang mthun pa chab kyis bkang la gzhag / ma 'byor na sa las byas pa yang rung ngo //
T02TD1303E:209b-20: dgang gzar dang blugs gzar dang mar mdun du gzhag / g-yas su zangs gzhong gi nang du dris bkang la ku sha bcug la pro ksha na'i snod gzhag go //
T02TD1303E:209b-21: las kyi bum pa gcig kyang gzhag go //
T02TD1303E:209b-22: til la sogs pa sreg rdzas kyang gzhag go //
T02TD1303E:209b-23: de la rdzas kyi rim pa rgyas pa la zho /
T02TD1303E:209b-26: drag po la tsher ma can gyi shing /
T02TD1303E:209b-27: phyi ma rim pa bzhin no //
T02TD1303E:209b-31: rdzas byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02TD1303E:209b-32: gzhong bu kun gyi steng du rdo rje bzhag la /
T02TD1303E:209b-33: de nyid gsum gyi sngags brdzod pas /
T02TD1303E:209b-34: 'jig rten kun gyi rtog pa kun bsal nas /
T02TD1303E:209b-35: rdzas de nyid bzang por bsam mo //
T02TD1303E:209b-36: yam shing gi rim pa la /
T02TD1303E:209b-37: zhi ba'i yam shing ni 'o ma can gyi shing dang rlon pa rtse mo dang bcas pa byung ba /
T02TD1303E:209b-38: srid du mdzub gang ba sboms su chag pa gang yod pa sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma dang /
T02TD1303E:209b-39: tsandan dkar po'i chus spangs pa /
T02TD1303E:209b-40: rtse gcig tu zhi ba'i las la dbul lo //
T02TD1303E:209b-42: srid du khru gang ba sboms su zhi ba dang mthun no //
T02TD1303E:209b-43: yal ga dang dbus kyi cha las byung ba /
T02TD1303E:209b-44: zho dang mar dang ser po'i dri las spangs pa /
T02TD1303E:209b-45: rtse gcig tu rgyas pa'i las la dbul lo //
T02TD1303E:210a-1: sor lnga pa 'dab ma dang sboms su chag gang ba yungs mar dang bdud rtsi la sogs kyis spangs la /
T02TD1303E:210a-2: dbang gi las la dbul lo //
T02TD1303E:210a-5: rtse mo can gyi shing las byung ba /
T02TD1303E:210a-6: gsod pa'i las la rab tu shis pa /
T02TD1303E:210a-7: mi rus dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dang /
T02TD1303E:210a-8: thal chen lan tshva kha ba dang /
T02TD1303E:210a-9: tsha ba'i rdzas rnams chu la spangs la /
T02TD1303E:210a-10: rab tu bsgrims la mngon spyod kyi las la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1303E:210a-12: bud shing gi rim pa la /
T02TD1303E:210a-13: pa la sha dang n+ya gro dha la sogs pa las bya'o //
T02TD1303E:210a-14: de med na 'o ma can gyi shing skam po las byas la las kyi rjes su mthun par bya'o //
T02TD1303E:210a-15: de nas slob dpon gyis yi dam lha'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs pa dang /
T02TD1303E:210a-17: aanytsa m'a nam aa rgha bi dhi dang /
T02TD1303E:210a-18: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul ba dang /
T02TD1303E:210a-19: nang gi byag rgya'i mchod pa bya /
T02TD1303E:210a-21: de nas ku shas thams cad la pro ksha nam bya'o //
T02TD1303E:210a-22: de nas lcags la sogs pa'i snod sar par shing brtsigs la /
T02TD1303E:210a-23: gtsubs pa la sogs pa'i me blangs la /
T02TD1303E:210a-24: rlung yab kyis g-yabs la me sbar ro //
T02TD1303E:210a-25: de la sbar ba'i sngags ni /
T02TD1303E:210a-26: aom dzava la dzva la h'um phat ces so //
T02TD1303E:210a-27: de nas du ba med cing legs par 'bar ba dang /
T02TD1303E:210a-28: thab khung gi shing ba rtsigs pa la blugs so //
T02TD1303E:210a-30: de nas ku sha 'bring gnyis shar phyogs su kha bstan la gzhag / lho dang nub dang byang du yang de bzhin bstan /
T02TD1303E:210a-32: aom badzra sa tva a'a au she sv'a h'a /
T02TD1303E:210a-33: ku sha dgram pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1303E:210a-34: de nas slob dpon yi dam bsgom pa dang ldan pas thab kyi nang du sna tshogs padma 'dab brgyad pa cig bsams la /
T02TD1303E:210a-35: de'i dbus su mngon par byang chub pa lnga dang ldan pas kye'i rdo rje yab yum bsgom mo //
T02TD1303E:210a-36: 'dod chags chen po skyes pa'i stobs kyis zhu nas dngul chu bzhin du gnas pa las /
T02TD1303E:210a-37: de nyid yi ge h'um dang dzam gnyis su gyur /
T02TD1303E:210a-38: yi ge gnyis yongs su gyur pa las me lha yab yum du bskyed de /
T02TD1303E:210a-39: me lha zhal gsum phyag drug pa gsus pa ldir ba ral pa'i thor cog can /
T02TD1303E:210a-41: rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD1303E:210a-42: g-yas kyi bar ma ni gundhe'o //
T02TD1303E:210b-0: @210b tha ma na bgrang phreng sku mdog las kyi bye brag dang mthun pa'o //
T02TD1303E:210b-1: de ltar bsams pa'i thugs kar sna tshogs padma de'i steng du gru gsum me /
T02TD1303E:210b-5: me lha dam tshig sems dpa' bsgom pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1303E:210b-6: de la yang proksha nam la sogs pa gar yan chad bya'o //
T02TD1303E:210b-7: de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te /
T02TD1303E:210b-8: slob dpon gar dang ldan pas /
T02TD1303E:210b-9: dza: lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas spyan drang ngo //
T02TD1303E:210b-10: de nas mdun gyi nam mkha' las kyang bkug la thab kyi khar bzhag / de nas proksha nam dang aa nytsa m'a nam la sogs pa phyag bya ba yan chad bya /
T02TD1303E:210b-11: de nas yang proksha nam la sogs pa gsum bya'o //
T02TD1303E:210b-12: gang dang ldan pas zhags pas gnyis su med par bstim /
T02TD1303E:210b-15: de nas yang proksha nam la sogs pa gsum bya'o //
T02TD1303E:210b-16: de nas gzar bu gnyis kyi nang du yi dam gyi lha'i snying po'i yi ge h'um re re bsam mo //
T02TD1303E:210b-17: de nas gru mo gnyis sprad la /
T02TD1303E:210b-19: aom na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02TD1303E:210b-22: aom aagna ye pushtim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1303E:210b-23: de nas blugs gzar gyis dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD1303E:210b-24: dgang gzar gzhag / aom sarba sam pa de sv'a h'a /
T02TD1303E:210b-27: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya aa mu ka sarba p'a pam da ha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1303E:210b-29: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02TD1303E:210b-31: aom badzra pushta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1303E:210b-33: aom aa pra ti ha ta badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1303E:210b-35: aom badzra bi dz'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1303E:210b-37: ma h'a be g'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1303E:210b-39: aom ma h'a ba l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1303E:210b-41: aom badzra ghasma ri ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1303E:210b-44: aom badzra yadzny'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1303E:210b-46: aom bo dhi priksh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1303E:210b-48: aom badzra rta t'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1303E:210b-50: aom badzra sa ha ka r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1303E:210b-52: de nas yang mar dgang gzar khengs pa stong man chod dbul lo //
T02TD1303E:210b-53: de nas yang pro ksha nam la sogs pa bya /
T02TD1303E:210b-55: rdo rje dkur brten dril bu gsil la /
T02TD1303E:210b-56: srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i tshigs bcad brjod do //
T02TD1303E:210b-57: de nas me lha la bstod pa bya /
T02TD1303E:211a-0: de nas las kyi bum pa'i @211a * //
T02TD1303E:211a-1: chus thab khung du lan gsum ku shas gtor la bsang bar bya'o //
T02TD1303E:211a-2: de nas me lha'i thugs kar dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i 'khor lo bsams la /
T02TD1303E:211a-3: me lha'i kha hom khung du bsams /
T02TD1303E:211a-4: de nas ye shes sems dpa' gar dang ldan par dza: sa spyan drangs mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol /
T02TD1303E:211a-5: proksha nam la sogs pa kun rdzogs pa dang /
T02TD1303E:211a-6: yang phyag rgya bzhis dgug pa dang /
T02TD1303E:211a-9: dgyes pa bskyed nas gnyis su med par bstims la /
T02TD1303E:211a-10: de nas yang proksha nam la sogs pa phyag bya ba yan chad bya'o //
T02TD1303E:211a-11: de nas mar gzar bu nyi shu rtsa gcig man chad dbul lo //
T02TD1303E:211a-12: de nas zho la sogs pa'i rdzas kyi rim pa lha la dbul lo //
T02TD1303E:211a-13: yang mar gyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad man chad dbul lo //
T02TD1303E:211a-14: yang proksha nam la sogs pa bya /
T02TD1303E:211a-15: rdo rje dkur brten dril bu gsil la /
T02TD1303E:211a-16: srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i //
T02TD1303E:211a-19: de nas gar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha la phyag bya'o //
T02TD1303E:211a-20: aom badzra mu: sa gshegs su gsol /
T02TD1303E:211a-22: de nas rdzas lhag ma ci yod pas me lha la mchod pa dbul lo //
T02TD1303E:211a-23: aom badzra aagna ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1303E:211a-24: zhes rdzas kun zad par blugs gzar gyis dbul lo //
T02TD1303E:211a-25: de nas slob ma kun me tog lag tu thogs la rjes su yi rang ba bgyi ste /
T02TD1303E:211a-26: slob dpon gyis dgang gzar mar gyis bkang ba'i nang du slob ma kun gyis me tog blugs te /
T02TD1303E:211a-27: slob dpon gyis kyang badzra aagna ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1303E:211a-29: slob mas kyang rgyas par gyur cig gam /
T02TD1303E:211a-30: zhi bar gyur cig pa'i rjes su yi rang ba bya'o //
T02TD1303E:211a-31: zhi ba yin na ru ru sphu ru'i sngags kyis mar la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad la rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o //
T02TD1303E:211a-32: rjes dbul ba'i rim pa la /
T02TD1303E:211a-33: proksha nas ni spyir bsang bar bya'o //
T02TD1303E:211a-34: aanytsa m'a nas ni me tog mtheb mdzub gyis blangs la /
T02TD1303E:211a-35: zhal dang thugs dang phyag tu dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1303E:211a-36: aargha ni dung phor nas skyor mos lan gsum mdun du dbul lo //
T02TD1303E:211a-37: p'a dyam ni dung phor nas mtheb mdzub gnyis kyis me tog blangs la /
T02TD1303E:211a-38: smad de thab kyi zhabs la phog par byas la lan gsum zhal bsil dbul lo //
T02TD1303E:211a-39: las kyi bum pa ni bsang ba'o //
T02TD1303E:211a-40: sla ba'i rdzas ni zhal du dbul lo //
T02TD1303E:211b-0: 'bras @211b la sogs pa rnams ni phyag tu dbul /
T02TD1303E:211b-5: aargha dang mar me mdun du dbul /
T02TD1303E:211b-6: me'i de kho na nyid ni bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o //
T02TD1303E:211b-7: lha rnams mnyes par bya ba dang /
T02TD1303E:211b-8: sngags rnams gzi byin skye ba dang /
T02TD1303E:211b-9: sdig pa rnams ni bsreg pa'i phyir //
T02TD1303E:211b-10: bzlas pa bas kyang sbyin sreg shis /
T02TD1303E:211b-11: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal gyis zhabs kyis bshad pa rdzogs so//
